item.title: golang启动多个端口
item.description: 1. 使用NewServeMux ，启动多个端口 package main import ( "fmt" "github.com/gin-gonic/gin" "net/http" ) func main() { //gin 框架 engin := gin.Default() engin.GET("/api", func(context *gin.Context) { fmt.Println(context.Request.URL, context.Request.Host) }) //浏览器访问 http://localhost:8080/api mux := http.NewServeMux() mux.HandleFunc("/api", myHandler) go http.ListenAndServe(":8080", mux) //浏览器访问 http://localhost:8081/api mux1
